data.title: Which GTA schools are reporting COVID-19 cases?
data.meta_description: Ontario is updating which of the province's schools are reporting COVID-19 cases. 680 News will update this list daily with everything you need to know.
data.text:
By News Staff

This story is no longer being updated as of Oct. 15. Please check CityNews’ COVID-19 page for further updates.

As many students opt for in-class learning, Ontario’s government is doing its part in letting you know which of the province’s school boards are, or have reported cases of COVID-19.

As of October 15, there are 380 active cases of COVID-19. In its daily update on Wednesday, the province confirmed 1,145 school cases since the beginning of the school year with 686 coming in the last 14 days.

Note: School boards with no cases have not been listed.
